root.name: UFO: Afterlight
root.description: GameplayUFO: Afterlight is the final game in the UFO trilogy, after UFO: Aftermath and UFO: Aftershock. Its gameplay is largely derived from the X-COM series, with the characteristic split between large-scale strategy and combat tactics. On the strategic side, the player manages personnel and bases on Mars, exploring new territories, researching new technologies, with the ultimate goal of terraforming Mars. On the tactical side, the player controls a squad of soldiers fighting hostile Martians.PC System RequirementsMinimum:Windows 2000/XP with DirectX 8.11 GHz CPU512 MB RAM5 GB Hard Disk SpaceNvidia 5700 or ATI Radeon 9500 video cardSound Blaster compatible sound cardRecommended:Windows 2000/XP with DirectX 9.0c,2 GHz CPU768 MB RAM5 GB Hard Disk SpaceNvidia 6600 GT, or ATI Radeon 9800 video cardSound Blaster® X-Fi™ sound card
